response.overview: The Blind Man has been hiding out for several years in an isolated cabin and has taken in and raised a young girl orphaned from a devastating house fire. Their quiet life together is shattered when a group of criminals kidnap the girl, forcing the Blind Man to leave his safe haven to save her.
response.tagline: Bad things happen to bad people.
response.title: Don't Breathe 2

titles.title: ลมหายใจสั่งตาย 2

release_dates.note: Also in Hindi, Tamil and Telugu.
